dreaming_journey_to_the_west:Bloodthirst.NAME: Bloodthirsty Fire Eyes
DESCRIPTIONS: For every two attack cards played, restore 2 life points.

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:Bracelets.NAME: Bracelets
dreaming_journey_to_the_west:Bracelets.FLAVOR: A protective gear that helps a little with boxing.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an #yAttack with #yBoxing , gain #b1 temporary #yDexterity . Whenever you play an #ySkill with #yBoxing  gain #b1 #yVigor .

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:FuriousRing.NAME: Furious Ring
dreaming_journey_to_the_west:FuriousRing.FLAVOR: Humiliated and indignant, unhappy or angry.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b2 #yStrength .While your HP is at or below #b50%,gain #yIndignation.

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:GreedRing.NAME: Greed Ring
dreaming_journey_to_the_west:GreedRing.FLAVOR: The greed for money, sex, fame, food and sleep.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, decline your Max HP by #r10% ,gain an extra level when you gain #yVulnerable, #yFragile, #yWeak，At the end of combat,gain  #y20 #yGold，double the chance of finding #yRare cards from combat rewards.

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:ObsessionRi.NAME: 痴迷之戒
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose [E] ，At the end of your turn, gain #b1 #yblock ,whenever you gain a #rDebuff ,gain #b1 extra #yBuffer .
